runs.comm: good start from Afzal. Back of a length outside off, Coetzer gets forward and defends
short ball and dispatches. Picks the length very early and smashes it into the vacant midwicket region. Too slow and too wide from Afzal, easy pickings.
even better result for Scotland this time, full on middle, Coetzer waits for it and belts it over mid-on and the boundary for six!
tightens his line this time, keeps it on off stump, Coetzer blocks
four more, Scotland running away with it very early. SHort again and Coetzer pulls it beautifully past the diving square leg fielder
gets it just past midwicket. Fuller again and Coetzer tries to loft it over mid-on but it skews off the inside half and beats midwicket for two
just a bit of away shape outside the off stump, MacLeod shoulders arms
good looking stroke this time, just a couple of steps forward and punches well to mid-off
shorter and wider with hint of out swing, MacLeod flays his hands at it but misses
some more swing for Amjad, but it is too wide. MacLeod throws his hands at it and misses again
wicket this time. No swing and MacLeod gets forward and tries to block, but gets a huge inside edge which rattles the stumps. Important wicket for HK.
fuller outside off, trying to get it to swing but finds none, driven off the front-foot to mid-off
flat and quick, comes in with the arm, defends to cover
slightly slower, Coetzer is early on the pull and toe-ends it back to the bowler
shorter and wide, hit to point
darted in again, this time Coetzer waits for it well and drives it off the back foot down to long-off
short and on leg, easy ball for Cross, he waits for it and sweeps it to the left of fine-leg. Easy boundary
slightly more air this time, Cross gets forward and turns it away to deep square leg
good cricket from both players. Good length on off stump, Cross waits and glides it down to third man
poor ball this time, can't keep erring on the short side, bangs it in and Coetzer obliges - he waits for it and belts it over midwicket for another boundary
keep 'em coming, says Coetzer. Amjad goes fuller, Coetzer was expecting that, he waits for it and smashes it down the ground past mid-on
back of a length on off stump, defended to point
another boundary for Coetzer. Overpitched again from Amjad and Coetzer clears his front foot and launches it down the ground over mid-on, didn't get all of that but got enough of it to carry for four
played off the back foot to cover point
short and wide, asking to be hit. Cross rocks back and cuts it elegantly for yet another boundary
great shot from Cross. Gets down on one knee and sweeps it powerfully past fine-leg. Boundaries leaking from HK.
not a bad shot again, tossed up from Nadeem and gets a bit of spin, Cross doesn't check his shot, goes through with it and gets it over cover
this time a full-blooded lofted extra cover drive. Waits for the ball to spin and opens the face of the bat and clears extra cover
flatter and played off the backfoot into the leg side
tries to get it over extra cover again, but the ball comes in with the arm and gets Cross' inside edge and rolls away to deep square leg
big six! bad ball, great shot. Back of a length on leg stump, Cross swats it way over the square leg boundary
didn't get all of it but enough to clear mid-on. Slightly fuller but on leg stump again, Cross gets under it and lofts it over mid-on
and another six. Poor bowling from Afzal. Drifts on his pads again, Cross gets under it and gets enough connection this time, clears the midwicket boundary by a metre
four more. Wide outside off, Cross flays at it and gets enough bat on it to clear extra cover

gone this time. Fuller and wide outside off again, Cross looks to clear the infield again but doesn't. He throws his hands at it and hits it in the air and straight to cover point. Respite for HK but maybe, a bit too late.
fuller ball, outside off, driven off the front foot to cover point
goes short first up, Coetzer is in his comfort zone and pulls well into the deep square leg region
shorter again, slightly wider outside off  but no problem for Coetzer. Punishes it past widwicket for another brace
short and wide outside off, missed opportunity for Coetzer. He is beaten on the cut
out this time. Just a tad fuller from Irfan's previous deliveries, Coetzer smashes it off the front foot but straight at midwicket. Good, sharp catch taken by Rath there.
back of a length on middle stump, blocked off the front foot
fuller but a little wider, driven to point off the front foot
drifts well down the leg side to start his spell
good length on middle at 120 kph, defended off the front foot
good length delivery on off stump, Munsey guides it down to third man
wider outside off at 127 kph, punched off the front foot to the sweeper on the off side
short, wide and cut but straight at point
fuller but sticks with the outside off stump line, Munsey is beaten
goes over mid-off this time. Skips down the track with intent and belts it over the infield, well picked from Munsey and good shot selection too.
clipped off his pads down to fine leg
well played, gets on top of the bounce and keeps this rising back of a length delivery down and past backward point
nips back in, 129 kph, the inside edge rolls down to third man
bounces a bit extra, a bit quicker too, 133 kph, Munsey goes for the pull but is hit on the body and rolls down to Atkinson who misfields as he slips
edged and gone. Another wicket for Irfan. A bit of away seam movement, Berrington looks to hoick it over midwicket but the movement helps take a thin edge. Easy catch for Atkinson.
solidly blocks the first ball, fuller on off stump and defended with intent
shorter length on middle, tucked down to fine leg
the shorter ball on middle is pulled on the ground to deep square leg
bangs it in once more, pulled on its way down to fine leg
short and quite wide outside off, the cut finds point
poor ball this time, bangs it in again well down the leg, helped down to fine leg for another single
beaten this time, 126 kph, full ball outside off stump, Munsey is beaten on his drive
back of a length outside off, dabbed down to third man
good shot, well picked. Irfan continues to go short, he waits for it and lofts it over short midwicket and it races away
cut away off the wide ball to the sweeper on the off side
what a shot! quality stroke, times it to perfection. Keeps his shape and lofts it well over the long-off boundary for another six.
free hit coming up. Irfan oversteps by a big margin. It is short and wide again, cut away to backward point where there is some neat fielding to stop it from beating him.
the free hit is punished, not a great ball even if it wasn't a free hit. Full on his pads, easily picked away over fine leg for four, juts lands inside the boundary
131 kph, tickled away off his pads down to fine leg
there is four of them. One bounce and into the boundary, slower ball and it is met after a couple of steps down the track. Smashed over cover
picked away off his pads, one bounce down to fine leg
another wicket for HK. But all a bit too little, too late. Short ball down leg and Mommsen goes for the pull and gets a thick edge which is easily taken by the keeper
short and wide and pulled over mid-on, almost makes it to the boundary but pulled back just inside
low full toss, swiped away on the ground to deep square leg
fired in on leg at 123 kph, neatly clipped but straight to midwicket
cut away to point to bring scores level. One needed for Scotland.
and that will do it, low full toss driven down to mid-off, easy run on offer and they take it. Easy win for Scotland, with 46 balls to spare.
